PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2025-03402025-03-07PSPC
ActFinancial Administration Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Public Works and Government Services of GORDON RODNEY BEDFORD HELM of Halifax, Nova Scotia, to be a director of the board of directors of Defence Construction (1951) Limited, to hold office during pleasure for a term of four years, in the place of Claude Frank Lloyd, whose term has expired.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Approval of the appointment by the Minister of Public Works and Government Services of GORDON RODNEY BEDFORD HELM of Halifax, Nova Scotia, to be a director of the board of directors of Defence Construction (1951) Limited, to hold office during pleasure for a term of four years, in the place of Claude Frank Lloyd, whose term has expired.
